summary.span: 顯示讓使用者選取 或 條件的核取方塊。

span.span: Displays a check box that allows the user to select a or condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#Introduction) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 簡介Introduction 使用控制項，以允許使用者選取`true`或`false`狀態。Use the control to allow the user to select a `true` or `false` state. 如果您打算使用多個控制項，控制項是其他控制項，可提供方便的資料繫結功能。If you plan to use multiple controls, the control is an alternative control that provides convenient data binding capabilities. 不過，個別控制項提供版面配置較大的控制權。However, individual controls provide greater control over layout. > [!IMPORTANT] > A控制項接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。A control accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET mobile Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET mobile Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用控制項來指出是否已含稅的計算銷售總額。The following example demonstrates how to use a control to indicate whether tax is included in the calculation for a sales total. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否在按一下時自動回傳 狀態到伺服器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the state automatically posts back to the server when clicked.

value.span: 若要在按一下時，自動回傳 控制項的狀態至伺服器，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: to automatically post the state of the control to the server when it is clicked; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定是否狀態控制項回傳至伺服器時按下。Use this property to specify whether the state of the control is posted back to the server when clicked. > [!NOTE] > 將此屬性設定為`true`每次按一下控制項時，會造成伺服器往返。Setting this property to `true` causes a round trip to the server every time the control is clicked. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用表示自動回傳的狀態屬性當按一下控制項時，伺服器控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to automatically post the state of the control to the server when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示選取 控制項時，是否執行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is selected.

value.span: 如果按一下 時會執行驗證，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the is clicked; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷是否在用戶端和伺服器上執行驗證時選取控制項。Use the property to determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a control is selected. 頁面驗證判斷所有頁面上的驗證控制項相關聯的輸入的控制項是否通過驗證控制項所指定的驗證規則。Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules as specified by the validation control. 根據預設，按一下控制項不會造成頁面驗證。By default, clicking a control does not cause page validation. 若要執行頁面驗證時按下控制項時，設定屬性設`true`。To perform page validation when the control is clicked, set the property to `true`. 時的值屬性設定為`true`，您也可以使用屬性設為其指定驗證群組名稱控制項引發驗證。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來判斷是否已核取控制項。Use this property to determine whether the control is checked. 這個屬性也可用來以程式設計方式設定狀態的控制項。This property can also be used to programmatically set the state of the control. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷狀態的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the state of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). Public Custom Event CheckedChanged As EventHandler
public: virtual event EventHandler ^ CheckedChanged;
member this.CheckedChanged : EventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 屬性的值在送至伺服器的公佈間變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時的值張貼至伺服器之間的屬性變更。The event is raised when the value of the property changes between posts to the server. 此事件不會將頁面回傳至伺服器，除非屬性設定為`true`。This event does not post the page back to the server unless the property is set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > A控制項必須保存一些張貼至這個事件來正常運作的伺服器之間的值。A control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 請務必對這個控制項，會啟用檢視狀態。Be sure that view state is enabled for this control. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to:使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code the handler for the event of a control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每個程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/CS/checkboxcheckedchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/VB/checkboxcheckedchangedvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged2/CS/checkboxcheckedchanged2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged2/VB/checkboxcheckedchanged2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 方法會檢查的回傳資料控制不同於先前的值，而且如果是的話，載入內容，並傳回`true`。The method checks if the postback data of the control is different from its previous value, and if so, loads the content and returns `true`.

span.span: Loads the previously saved view state of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法會還原檢視狀態資訊中所儲存的先前頁面要求物件方法。The method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

summary.span: 這允許您直接處理事件。

span.span: This allows you to handle the event directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時的值張貼至伺服器之間的屬性變更。The event is raised when the value of the property changes between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > A控制項必須保存一些張貼至這個事件來正常運作的伺服器之間的值。A control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 請務必對這個控制項，會啟用檢視狀態。Be sure that view state is enabled for this control. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md) 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式事件的控制項。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code the handler for the event of a control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，並可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 每個程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/CS/checkboxcheckedchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/VB/checkboxcheckedchangedvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged2/CS/checkboxcheckedchanged2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged2/VB/checkboxcheckedchanged2vb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override object SaveViewState ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance object SaveViewState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function SaveViewState () As Object
protected: override System::Object ^ SaveViewState();
override this.SaveViewState : unit -> obj

summary.span: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來 檢視狀態的變更。

span.span: Saves the changes to the view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 含有 檢視狀態之變更的物件，如果沒有任何檢視狀態與物件產生關聯，則為 。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state; otherwise, if no view state is associated with the object, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項，也就是執行個體的屬性的類別。These values are automatically placed in the property for the server control, which is an instance of the class. 儲存狀態伺服器控制項的生命週期階段之後，這個屬性的值然後會保存到字串物件。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control's life cycle. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 網頁生命週期概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7949d756-1a79-464e-891f-904b1cfc7991). 儲存檢視狀態時，此字串物件會傳回給用戶端做此變數會儲存在隱藏的 HTML input 項目。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element. 當您撰寫自訂伺服器控制項時，您可以藉由覆寫來改善效率並修改伺服器控制項的屬性。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the and modifying the property for your server control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 開發自訂 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)並[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef) and [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 取得或設定與 關聯的文字標籤。

span.span: Gets or sets the text label associated with the .

value.span: 與 關聯的文字標籤。

span.span: The text label associated with the .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定相關聯的文字標籤控制項。Use this property to specify the text label associated with the control. 這個屬性也可用來以程式設計方式取得相關聯的文字標籤控制項。This property can also be used to programmatically get the text label associated with the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控制項可用來顯示使用者輸入，其中可能包含惡意的用戶端指令碼。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 檢查從用戶端可執行的指令碼、 SQL 陳述式，或其他程式碼傳送之前顯示在您的應用程式中的任何資訊。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供使用者輸入來封鎖指令碼和 HTML 的輸入的要求驗證功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 驗證伺服器控制項也會提供以評估使用者輸入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：使用 Web Forms 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md). 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用與相關聯的屬性，以指定的文字標籤控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text label associated with the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/CS/checkboxcheckedchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/VB/checkboxcheckedchangedvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定與 關聯的文字標籤的對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the text label associated with the control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性，以指定的文字標籤的對齊方式相關聯控制項。Use this property to specify the alignment of the text label associated with the control. 您可以指定的文字標籤是否顯示向右或左邊的核取方塊。You can specify whether the text label appears to the right or left of the check box. 使用屬性，以指定的標籤文字。Use the property to specify the label text. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性右邊的核取方塊中顯示的文字標籤。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display the text label to the right of the check box. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模型，可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到空白文字檔，副檔名為.aspx。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 的程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁的程式碼模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string ValidationGroup { get; set; }
.property instance string ValidationGroup
Public Overridable Property ValidationGroup As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ValidationGroup { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.ValidationGroup : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定控制項群組， 控制項會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 控制項群組， 會在回傳至伺服器時，針對這個群組進行驗證。

span.span: The group of controls for which the causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證群組可讓您將在頁面上的驗證控制項指派給特定的類別。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每個驗證群組可以單獨在頁面上的其他驗證群組進行驗證。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用屬性來指定驗證群組的名稱，回傳至伺服器時，控制項引發驗證。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 屬性沒有作用時，才的值屬性設定為`true`。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 當您指定的值屬性，只是指定群組的成員的驗證控制項會驗證當控制項回傳至伺服器。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果您未指定的值而屬性設定為`true`，當控制項回傳至伺服器時，會驗證所有頁面上不會指派給驗證群組的驗證控制項。If you do not specify a value for the and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

related.span: CheckBox 和 CheckBoxList Web 伺服器控制項

span.span: CheckBox and CheckBoxList Web Server Controls
